enable_geoip.label: Auto detect user country using GeoIP

disable_shop_cart.label: Disable Shopping Cart Page
disable_shop_cart.comment: Customer will go directly to checkout page

updateqtyproduct.label: Allow updating product quantity in checkout page

allowremoveproduct.label: Allow removing product in checkout page

show_poll.label: Show poll on check out page

disable_os.label: Auto disable One Step Checkout Pro on Smartphone

style_color.label: Style Color
style_color.comment: Choose color (Scroll over vertical bar, then move circle to desired color in left hand box, save setting with ball in lower right corner)

street_lines.label: Number of Lines in a Street Address
street_lines.comment: Leave empty for default (2). Valid range: 1-4

allowcoupon.label: Coupon Code
allowcoupon.comment: Set up coupons under Promotions – Shopping Cart Rule

showimageproduct.label: Product Image
showimageproduct.comment: Show Thumbnail image in Checkout Cart

enable_giftmessage.label: Gift Message
enable_giftmessage.comment: please enable gift messages in configuration/Sales/Sales/Gift Options

price_gift_wrap.label: Gift Wrap Fee
price_gift_wrap.comment: Enter the amount of gift wrap fee

mw_custom_fee.label: Mw Custom Fee
mw_custom_fee.comment: Enter the amount of custom fee

options_sort.label: Sort Fields
options_sort.comment: Set the same position number if two fields are on the same line (Ignore if field is disabled). First/Last name automatically on first line.

ajax_shippingmethod.label: Enable Update Shipping Methods
ajax_shippingmethod.comment: Update shipping methods when address fields change. Set Yes only if shipping methods need to reload.

ajax_paymentmethod.label: Enable Update Payment Methods
ajax_paymentmethod.comment: Update payment methods when address fields change. Set Yes only if payment methods need to reload.

ajax_updatepro_shipping.label: Update shipping method when customer updates product quantity

ajax_shipping_payment.label: Update payment method when customer updates shipping method

select_term_conditions.label: Select Terms and Conditions
select_term_conditions.comment: You can add other agreements in Sale/ Terms and conditions

content_options.label: Content Terms And Conditions
content_options.comment: If you choose custom agreement, please enter the content of the terms and conditions into box

asa_option.label: Show As soon as possible option

formatdate.label: Format Date
formatdate.comment: This format date will show in checkout page with customer

rangeday.label: Maximum Allowed Delivery Period (in weeks)
rangeday.comment: Choose maximum # of weeks customer may select delivery period within

disableday.label: National Holidays (no delivery)
disableday.comment: Enter off-shipping days with the format (mm/dd/yyyy), comma separated and no spaces

enableday.label: Extra Available Days to Ship
enableday.comment: Enter only weekend days with the format (mm/dd/yyyy), comma separated and no space

addtimerange.comment: Add Time Range with the format 24h (h:m), ex. 7:30
